mapper.select: select * from t_ship_disburden where DISBURDEN_ID=#{disburdenId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_ship_disburden where UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
mapper.update:
update t_ship_disburden
ALIVE_FLAG='0' ,UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE()
where (AGREEMENT_UUID , UNLOAD_PORT_CODE ,OIL_TYPE_CODE) NOT IN
(#{item.agreementUuid}, #{item.unloadPort} , #{item.oilType} )
AND SHIP_PACT_UUID=#{shipPactUuid}
